alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 6:53AM MST until March 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet and La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Feet Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft
